name: Snapping Turtle Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +1 or monk level 1st.

sections.body: While using the Snapping Turtle Style feat with at least one hand free, you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your deft unarmed style allows you to shield your body from harm.
